nagi ena kridikawannadishani hendarsan - getwe (malala krida) nuwani nawodya - dharmashoka (mesa pandu) dinukshi premanath ‚Äì usas balika (ches) achini rathnasiri - kolambaa wishakha (badmintan)* nagi ena kridakayanhasintha sasiranga dharmashoka (mesa pandu) wayi.ji.si.en. wijesinha ‚Äì walala rathnayaka (malala krida) aar.ee.ayi.es. ranasinha ‚Äì aananda (bara isilima)* dakshathama kridikawanakshana maralanda ‚Äì mahamaya (malala krida) madhawi wirathunga - mahamaya (pihinum) tharunya shashini - dewananda (badmintan) miniruwani samarakon ‚Äì usas balika (pihinum)* dakshathama kridakayanlakshan koswaththa ‚Äì aananda (malala krida) chamira giganage - dharmashoka (mesa pandu) dilshan kariyawasam ‚Äì aananda (badmintan) heshan unambuwa - thrithwa (pihinum) shenal dayas - santha pithara (ragbi).
